item.description:
An update:

The movie is at 7:45, and I'll be at the theater at 7:15, and we'll head into the theater 10 minutes before showtime. If the move is downstairs, I'll be right behind the corded rope after ticket stubs have been ripped in front of the popcorn counter. If it's upstairs, I'll try to grab one of the tables in front of the coffee house near the large windows.

And now back to the original description...

Looks like it's time for a superhero beatdown...

A genetic anomaly allows a young man to teleport himself anywhere. He discovers this gift has existed for centuries and finds himself in a war that has been raging for thousands of years between "Jumpers" and those who have sworn to kill them.

Official Website: www.jumperthemovie.com

Trailer:

<object width="425" height="355"><embed src="http://www.youtube.co... type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425" height="355" style="margin : 5px ; max-width : 700px ; max-height : 700px"></embed></object>
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing my red baseball cap with the meetup logo. If the movie is upstairs I'll be waiting at the tables near the window; if it's downstairs I'll wait behind the rope of the ticket taker across from the popcorn stand.
item.why: Doug Liman, the same director as The Bourne Identity and Mr. and Mrs. Smith
item.name: Jumper
